channel.title: NSE:HDFCB on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NSE:HDFCB on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: HDFC Bank’s Board to Consider Issue of Bonus Shares on July 19
item.description: HDFC Bank Ltd. said it will consider a bonus issue of shares on July 19, when the country’s largest private sector lender is scheduled to announce its quarterly earnings.
